channel.title: Publics on Profiles
channel.description: Recent content in Publics on Profiles

item.description: CSS styles Files and folder structure explained: /, root /styles.css: the base files we use to import other /variables.css: to be used for using the same things accross files. We should use local variables when possible, but also move in this files all the things “common” between elements of the site. /utilities.css: keep here, because we want to get rid of it eventually /layout Defines the overall aspect of the site, the direction of the main elements (html, body, .
